reviewText:
Although I do not own this particular DVD, I do own each of these movies individually. Each one is very entertaining.
Twister - chasing tornadoes across the central USA. Not realistic but still entertaining.
The Perfect Storm - the last voyage of the Andrea Gale fishing vessel lost at sea during the "east coast storm of the century".
Outbreak- Dustin Hoffman tries to stop the spread of an Ebola-like hemoragic disease.
Poseidon- OK remake of the sinking of a cruise ship.
Overall, I would definitely recommend these movies (especially in a set). Very entertaining and worth the price.
perfect combination of 4 films in one set, one you'll get blown away, two you could sink in a ship, or three catch a virus, and four crash and drownd

This is an excellent DVD set. This should be in everyone's movie collection! This DVD has great actors/actress that do awesome roles with their charaters that they play. If you like/love to watch movies that can/will put you on the edge of your seat with action, then this is the DVD set to watch!
I ejoyed watching the movies that I did not get a chance to see back then. It gave me a chance to catch up on some of these excellent movies.

I enjoy a lot of the older movies and when some are presented with four, it is a great value.
I really enjoyed the newer version of Poseidon but hated the way Kurt Russell died. I have always
been a fan of his since he kicked Elvis's shin in "It happened at the World's Fair."
All movies I enjoyed of the topics covered.
Four excellant
Works OK and 4 are great
Great to have all of these on  one DVD
I mean, how could you say no to these 4 movies in one cheap package? Even if you only want two, it's really a deal.
Good movie combination
nice work
Great and fast.
Love Helen Hunt she shows such compassion in her acting she has some real acting talent, her and Gene Hackman make a great pair they hit it out of the park with their acting talent!
all films in good condition
Good dvd

Four films for a reasonable price is always a fair deal.  However, the quality of these movies are minimal [standard].  Also, be aware that the movie, Poseidon, is NOT the original 1972 version titled, THE POSEIDON ADVENTURE featuring an ensemble cast including Gene Hackman, Shelley Winters, Ernest Borgnine, and others in starring roles.  You will have to purchase the very popular award-winning 1972 movie on another DVD.

Among the four films featured in this DVD, OUTBREAK and TWISTER are probably the best.  Again, the cost is reasonable if you enjoy disaster/survival films. *Don't waste your time on the 2006 version of Poseidon. *Wish I had paid closer attention to the title prior purchasing.

Respectfully,

Maizie Lucille James
June 27, 2016
A gift for my husband and he loved it.

Arrived on time and we'll packaged for shipment. Honestly I do not like that the 4 discs were stacked on top of each other. The is only one spot to pop the disc down and all 4discs are there. They could pop lose and move around and get scratches. Luckily this did not happen while being shipped. I had to put some velour pieces in between each disc for protection but this makes it hard to snap the box closed.

Was looking to buy twister. Found four good movies in one!

Great

I'm using this set of films to accompany a "Super Disasters" unit in my English classroom. All except "Outbreak" are useful. While I've only used "Twister" so far, I can say that it definitely held the attention of all in the classroom. Student comments were very positive too. I'm really pleased with having four available in one set because I can easily switch from one to another.
I am glad to have been able to get all 4 of these in a single collection.  It is the best way to buy them.
Not on BluRay, but 2 decent Sci Fi movies at a great price.  Had I purchased each on BluRay, you'd be looking at a minimum of $40 bucks or more, and 4 DVD cases to find storage for.

This is an excellent selection of movies. I saw all 4 of them in the theater when they came out. They consist of all-star casts, excellent story lines, and high-quality acting. The special effects in all four movies are excellent but not overdone. The actors are the stars of the movies, not the disasters or challenges themselves.

This is a fantastic value for the money. These are 4 A-List movies. There's not a dog in the bunch!
Great buy!

Very happy with this DVD set. It is exactly what I expected. Money saver with the four movies.
Great way the spend a cold, raining night at home.
Just ignore this text.  Amazon insists that I type out an individual response to close this out.  Product quality is consistent with the number of stars.
There are great movies on here.  Yeah you can catch them on cable most days, but this collection makes for the perfect storm for movie night.

None of these are best of the breed but all are well done "emergency" situation  movies. Two show the challenge of Man against the Sea. One focuses on tornadoes and one on Disease. Each has in its cast at least one star and all have some really interesting scenes. I found each of them a solid choice for major film of the evening. No doubt, there has been and will be a different ranking of  quality among the films by different viewers. It is unlikely that less than three will be appealing.

The movies are (mostly) great.  But what you get is 4 DVDs stacked one on top of another with no spacing between them.  Not a great way to store and use DVDs.  I put mine in 3 extra DVD cases I had around.
...makes it tough to keep the movies playable but these survived the stacking and are 3 good movies by wolfgang peterson. 1 movie my jan de bont is so-so.
Can't beat the price, or the quality or the sound.  Wish that there were more four film package deals at this price

this is a wonderful set of movies, i purchased it for 'outbreak' but this four pack was the same price as buying the one movie by itself.  i'm glad i got all four movies, we've already watched 3 out of the 4. this was a great price and fast shipping
This was a great buy for four awesome disaster movies!  A must-have for disaster movie fans no matter the age.
These are good, fun movies. They may not be the best, but the stories keep ones interest. Pop some corn, and enjoy.

4 Great movies packed together in a single case. I don't like the fact that they become out of order in my alphabetical ordering of dvds but its a great space saver when you have 100's of movies.
Also, great price!
when you can make life a little easier with a movie than this is a real good movie to watch...
Love all 4 of these movies.  They are very good and I love the action in all of them. Thanks
if you have not got this then get it if you have not watch this then you miss out the best
This is a reall good deal for all four movies, bought this as a gift for my brother he loves it

I bought this and was very pleased with the product.  Some collections will compress multiple films onto a single disc.  This collection has four individual discs for each movie.  This way, video and audio do not suffer from additional compression (it is not blu-ray quality, but standard definition).  The 4-discs in one packaging also means you have one-quarter the shelf-space needed.

I am only commenting on the discs and the packaging.  Either you are familiar with the films or not.
Fast Shipping. Item exactly as described.
Great 4 movie set!!
Oh, brother, I love disaster movies! Twister is especially a favorite. Great to get 4 complete DVD discs!
Good deal, and titles

This is a great collection for the price especially if you're a DVD collector like me. Even if you purchase them used they are always in great condition. Four great movies for a low low price don't pass them up.......
Great movies, lots of action....good value.
